statements: SELECT * FROM employee_turnover;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_turnover ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT employee_name, join_date FROM employee_turnover WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM employee_turnover WHERE reason_for_attrition LIKE '%retirement%';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employee_turnover ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_turnover WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, reason_for_attrition FROM employee_turnover WHERE join_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employee_turnover;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employee_turnover WHERE reason_for_attrition IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM employee_turnover WHERE department IN ('Engineering', 'HR') ORDER BY join_date ASC, employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_turnover_reports;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employee_turnover_reports;
SELECT * FROM employee_turnover_reports WHERE turnover_reason='Retirement';
SELECT employee_name, turnover_reason FROM employee_turnover_reports ORDER BY turnover_date DESC;

SELECT employee_id, employee_name, turnover_date, reason_description FROM employee_turnover_reports INNER JOIN attrition_reasons ON employee_turnover_reports.turnover_reason = attrition_reasons.reason_description;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, turnover_date, turnover_reason FROM employee_turnover_reports;
SELECT employee_id, turnover_reason, employee_name, turnover_date FROM employee_turnover_reports;
SELECT employee_name, turnover_date FROM employee_turnover_reports WHERE turnover_reason='Resignation';
SELECT * FROM employee_turnover_reports WHERE turnover_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT reason_description, reason_id FROM attrition_reasons WHERE reason_description LIKE '%Retirement%';
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(hire_date) AS latest_hire_date FROM Employee;
SELECT e.name, a.reason_description FROM Employee e JOIN AttritionReasons a ON e.attrition_reason = a.reason_id;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(turnover_rate) AS total_turnover_rate FROM TurnoverRate GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_turnover_rate > 5;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM Employee WHERE attrition_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT turnover_rate, year, employee.name FROM TurnoverRate INNER JOIN Employee ON TurnoverRate.employee_id = Employee.employee_id WHERE year = 2022 ORDER BY turnover_rate DESC;
SELECT Employee.name, TurnoverRate.turnover_rate FROM Employee JOIN TurnoverRate ON Employee.employee_id = TurnoverRate.employee_id;
SELECT attrition_reason, reason_description FROM Employee JOIN AttritionReasons ON Employee.attrition_reason = AttritionReasons.reason_id ORDER BY reason_description ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' OR department = 'Marketing';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, turnover_reason FROM employees JOIN turnover_rates ON employees.employee_id = turnover_rates.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, attrition_date, reason FROM employees JOIN attrition_reasons ON employees.employee_id = attrition_reasons.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, department_name FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_name;
SELECT id, name, department FROM Employee;
SELECT name, hire_date, termination_date, reason_termination FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM Department WHERE location = 'London';
SELECT id, reason_name, description FROM TurnoverReason WHERE id = 3;
SELECT report_date, report_content FROM Report ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee ORDER BY department, hire_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT name, department FROM Employee WHERE termination_date IS NULL
SELECT e.name as EmployeeName, d.name as DepartmentName FROM Employee e LEFT JOIN Department d ON e.department = d.name WHERE e.termination_date IS NOT NULL
SELECT tr.reason_name, tr.description FROM TurnoverReason tr JOIN TurnoverRate trr ON tr.id = trr.employee_id WHERE trr.turnover_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT r.report_date, r.report_content FROM Report r ORDER BY r.report_date DESC LIMIT 5
